q: )-- David Cameron 's press chief, Andy Coulson , quit over alleged phone tapping when he edited Rupert Murdoch 's News of the World newspaper, prompting opposition Labour Party attacks on the U.K. prime minister's judgment. Continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today. fires back that the secretary of State had once been "the most senior military officer in our country" and no one else in the administration had "even a fraction of his experience" on intelligence matters. Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The Bill Clinton did not lie. The vice Bill Clinton did not lie. George Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie. The Congress did not lie. The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
